section.title: NetworkManager
section.para: Fedora 23 includes NetworkManager version 1.0.6, an upgrade from version 1.0.2 provided in Fedora 22. Some of the notable changes in this version are:

listitem.para: The command line network configuration utility nmcli has gained tab autocompletion and hints for more properties.
Device management can now be controlled with udev rules.
Interfaces such as veth and those from various virtualization tools like VMWare, VirtualBox, and Parallels are now ignored by default.
Numerous bug fixes and behavior enhancements.

section.para: See the NetworkManager 1.0.6 release announcement and NetworkManager 1.0.4 release announcements for a summary of changes between versions 1.0.2 and 1.0.6.
